room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: We disarmed the bomb with 1 1/2 minutes left. Phew...... We had so much fun. Great interactions with clues and listening clues. The room was decorated nicely and easy to manuver in. The employees were very very nice and seemed like they were having a great time too. We can't wait for the next theme to come out. We will be back and am telling friends. What a fun time for all ages.

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: This was an awesome experience. Next time we are in Denver we will be back for more!

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Fun activity that will either strengthen or end your relationships! Be mindful of who you take with you. In all seriousness we had a great time, thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Loved it! Great backstories on the puzzles, the staff member there was great and passionate about the place, and my group had a blast! Glad we beat Kazam with 4 seconds left

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: My family and I (3 generations) beta-tested Kazam and it's so much fun!! The look of the room is fantastic and the technology used in the room is clever and sophisticated. For those with steady hands, I recommend the Heist. You'll need them to solve the puzzles to grab the priceless coin.

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: I am worthy magicians apprentice! Just did Kazam with 3 of my coworkers. A combination of Goonies/Indiana Jones and National Treasure is how I would describe this room. 10/10 would kazam again

room_title: Escape room "Kazam!" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Super fun and mind boggling in the best way possible. Will definitely come back and tell all my friends about it.
